item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (245 points | 61 comments)
2. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (24 points | 1 comment)
3. Kamal Proxy – A minimal HTTP proxy for zero-downtime deployments (108 points | 53 comments)
4. Mount Unix system into Common Lisp image (10 points | 1 comment)
5. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (93 points | 58 comments)
6. Visualizing Weather Forecasts Through Landscape Imagery (510 points | 52 comments)
7. Show HN: Container Desktop – Podman Desktop Companion (397 points | 162 comments)
8. Critical Exploit in MediaTek Wi-Fi Chipsets: Zero-Click Vulnerability (190 points | 62 comments)

10. The Collapse of Self-Worth in the Digital Age (115 points | 72 comments)
11. Nango (YC W23) is hiring fullstack engs to solve product integrations ( | hide)
12. How do archivists package things? The battle of the boxes (116 points | 15 comments)
13. Cold war spy satellites and AI detect ancient underground aqueducts (54 points | 4 comments)

20. Reactive Relational Algebra (151 points | 30 comments)
21. Linux/4004: booting Linux on Intel 4004 for fun, art, and no profit (501 points | 127 comments)
22. Kubesafe: Never run Kubernetes commands on the wrong cluster again (47 points | 27 comments)
23. Antarctica's Ozone Hole Is Healing and Set to Recover by 2066 (31 points | discuss)
24. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (339 points | 95 comments)
25. Show HN: Open-source text classification CLI – train models with no labeled data (69 points | 3 comments)
26. Gaining access to anyones Arc browser without them even visiting a website (1284 points | 435 comments)
27. Tō Reo – A Māori Spellchecker (160 points | 31 comments)
28. Glass Antenna Turns Windows into 5G Base Stations (8 points | 1 comment)
29. Show HN: CNC Microscopy for Fun (116 points | 20 comments)
30. Large Text Compression Benchmark (83 points | 48 comments)
